body: I registered with DIF and received a signed statement back.

Excellent, thank you, Daniel; we'll come up with a step-by-step plan to integrate stuff with [Spec-Up-T](https://github.com/trustoverip/spec-up-t).  If you want maintainer access to the Spec-Up-T repo at TrustoverIP, we're happy to return the favor. Just let us know.   This issue can be closed.
Hi @aljones15 these features are going to be updated to match the approach in the updated IETF drafts. Please hold off on testing.
